home_h1_1: Premium surfing experience with top-tier equipment
home_h2_2: What you can do with us
home_h2_5: Ready to start with the most professional instruction and equipment?
home_p_21: Professional and safe instruction with quality equipment for all levels. A unique experience that combines advanced technique with passion for the sea.
home_p_22: Personalized surfing experiences with professional equipment and expert instruction. From first steps on the waves to advanced techniques - we're here for you.
home_p_23: One-on-one training with certified instructors who adjust the pace and techniques precisely to your level.
home_p_24: Group sessions up to 4 participants - intimate enough to get personal attention, social enough to enjoy together.
home_p_25: Not just rental - we help you choose the exact equipment that fits your height, weight and experience level.
home_p_26: Proper learning from the start - basic techniques, ocean safety rules, and reading wave conditions to surf with confidence.
home_p_27: Structured approach that allows you to see development - from video documentation to detailed feedback after each session.
home_p_28: All equipment undergoes regular inspections, thorough cleaning and ongoing maintenance - you get equipment in perfect condition every time.
home_p_29: Interested in learning more about our programs and rentals?
home_p_30: Every item undergoes daily inspection and professional maintenance to ensure maximum performance and complete safety
home_p_31: We'll help you find the perfect equipment for your level and surfing conditions
home_p_32: Our clients speak about the transformation - from initial confidence to safe and professional surfing. Every journey begins with one step, and we're here to accompany you on every wave.
home_p_33: "I was sure this wasn't for me. After 4 sessions with the רוח בגלים coaches, not only am I surfing - I feel confident in the water for the first time in my life."
home_p_34: "I've been surfing for years but always felt something was missing. The coaches here taught me advanced techniques that elevated my level several times over. They're truly professional."
home_p_35: "We rented equipment for the whole family and everything was perfect - the equipment fit exactly our level, and the staff was available for any question. Premium experience from start to finish."
home_p_36: Clear progression plan adapted to your pace
home_p_37: Relaxed and professional training with emphasis on safety
home_p_38: Equipment that fits exactly your level and goals
home_p_39: We'll customize the perfect path according to your level and surfing goals.
home_p_40: Exciting surfing experience and water activities for the whole family. Offering equipment rental, lessons and personalized programs.

contact_h2_4: Still not sure what you need?
contact_p_12: We're available to answer any questions and help you choose the perfect program or the most suitable equipment for your needs.
contact_p_13: Tell us about your surfing goals, your current experience level, and whether you need equipment rental. We'll get back to you quickly with a personalized plan.
contact_p_14: We operate along the Mediterranean coast, in the most perfect areas for wave surfing and kitesurfing. Our sessions take place on beaches with ideal surfing conditions, convenient accessibility and nearby parking.
contact_p_15: Public parking is available within a short walking distance from the meeting point. We recommend arriving 15 minutes before the lesson begins.
contact_p_16: Meet by the main lifeguard station. Our instructors will be waiting with a 'Wind in Waves' flag and will help you with the equipment.
contact_p_17: Swimwear, towel, sunscreen and hat. We provide all surfing equipment - surfboard, wetsuit and safety accessories.
contact_p_18: Don't worry – you can start simply. Come to an introductory course or rent equipment for one day and feel the waves yourself. We're here to help you find your perfect way to the water.
contact_p_19: Exciting surfing experience and water activities for the whole family. Offering equipment rental, lessons and personalized programs.
contact_p_20: © 2026 Wind in Waves. All rights reserved.

privacy_p_23: Exciting surfing experience and water activities for the whole family. We offer equipment rental, lessons, and personalized programs.
rentals_h1_1: Premium Equipment Rental, Guided and Hassle-Free
rentals_h2_5: Want the Perfect Equipment for Your Level?
rentals_p_19: We match you with the perfect equipment for your level, ensuring maximum safety and quality. Every item is inspected, cleaned, and personally fitted so you can focus on what matters - enjoying the waves.
rentals_p_20: Everything you need to start surfing – professional equipment maintained with care
rentals_p_21: A wide range of surfboards for every level – from wide and stable boards for beginners to advanced boards for experienced surfers. All our boards undergo daily inspection and are maintained to the highest standards.
rentals_p_22: Latest generation kites for kite surfing, suitable for different wind conditions. Our equipment includes kites in various sizes to perfectly match wind conditions and surfer weight, with advanced safety systems.
rentals_p_23: Essential safety equipment for every surfer – comfortable and adjustable harnesses for kite surfing and quality flotation vests. Equipment undergoes periodic inspections and is sanitized after each use to ensure maximum hygiene and safety.
rentals_p_24: All the small accessories that make the surfing experience perfect – wetsuits, safety leashes, board wax, fins and more. We make sure you don't miss anything to enjoy a perfect day on the water.
rentals_p_25: Interested in renting equipment? Contact us and we'll take care of all the details
rentals_p_26: Every piece of equipment undergoes a thorough inspection process to ensure your safety and comfort in the water
rentals_p_27: Every item undergoes comprehensive safety inspection before and after each rental. We check connections, seams, and safety systems so you can focus solely on surfing.
rentals_p_28: Ill-fitting equipment can ruin the experience. We ensure precise personal fitting to your height, weight and skill level - because comfortable surfing is better surfing.
rentals_p_29: Our equipment is specially tuned for local surfing conditions. Every fin is adjusted, every kite is balanced, and every suit is maintained to give you maximum performance.
rentals_p_30: "The equipment I rented was in perfect condition - a relatively new surfboard, clean and tidy wetsuit. The instructor took time to fit me with the right board for my level and gave professional tips on how to maintain it. This rental really elevated my surfing experience to another level."
rentals_p_31: "As someone just starting with wave surfing, I was worried about renting unsuitable equipment. The staff here took me step by step - explained about surfboard types, fitted me with a wetsuit in exactly the right size, and even gave a short briefing on how to enter the water. I felt safe and prepared, and the equipment was quality and comfortable."
rentals_p_32: We are here to guide you in choosing the right equipment that perfectly matches your abilities and surfing style. With years of experience and deep knowledge of all types of equipment, we'll ensure you head out to sea with complete confidence.
rentals_p_33: Exciting surfing and water activities experience for the whole family. We offer equipment rentals, lessons, and personalized programs.

programs_h1_1: Training programs built for safe progression
programs_h2_2: Choose a program that fits your pace
programs_h2_5: Tell us your goal – we'll recommend the perfect starting point
programs_p_20: Precise structure, maximum safety, and professional instruction that adapts to your pace
programs_p_21: Every training program is personally tailored to your goals – whether you're starting your journey or want to improve existing technique. We offer a wide range of learning tracks for all levels and ages.
programs_p_22: Accelerated track for beginners who want to quickly master the basics – balance, paddling, and wave reading. Focused training with emphasis on safety and building confidence in the water.
programs_p_23: For experienced surfers who want to upgrade performance – working on timing, advanced wave reading, and complex maneuvers. Suitable for those who already master the basics and want to level up.
programs_p_24: Unique program focusing on risk management, ocean conditions awareness, and safety protocols. Ideal for anyone who wants to surf confidently and know how to react in unexpected situations.
programs_p_25: Advanced track for ambitious surfers – athletic training, competitive strategies, and professional techniques. We'll work on speed, power, and precise execution of complex maneuvers.
programs_p_26: Special instruction program for children and teens ages 10+ – fun, safe, and age-appropriate learning. Emphasis on playfulness, teamwork, and building love for the ocean and sport.
programs_p_27: Designed for those experiencing fears or wanting to overcome mental barriers – we'll work at your pace, with patience and full support. Also suitable for those returning to surfing after a long break.
programs_p_28: All programs can be personally customized according to your goals, ocean conditions, and experience level. We'd be happy to build a unique track that fits your exact needs.
programs_p_29: Commitment to excellence in every aspect of surfing
programs_p_31: Every lesson is planned with emphasis on safety and maintaining international safety standards
programs_p_33: Surfing equipment rental with professional weekly maintenance for optimal performance
programs_p_35: Small groups for personal attention and faster progression
programs_p_37: From beginners to advanced - every surfer receives a personalized training program
programs_p_38: Certified instructors with years of experience teaching surfing to children and adults. Each instructor brings a unique approach, high professionalism, and genuine passion for the sea and surfing.
programs_p_40: 15 years of surfing instruction experience, specializing in training beginners and developing advanced techniques. My approach is based on building self-confidence and deep understanding of the sea and waves.
programs_p_42: Specializes in teaching children and teenagers, with emphasis on fun and safe learning. Holds international certifications and 8 years of instruction experience. Loves seeing her students progress and feel comfortable in the water.
programs_p_43: We'll adapt the instruction program to your level and personal comfort zone, so you feel safe and enjoy every step.
programs_p_44: Surfing experience and exciting water activities for the whole family. We offer equipment rental, lessons, and personalized programs.
contact_alt_66: Location map - where to find us
rentals_alt_89: Premium surfing equipment - surfboard, kite and safety vest ready for rental
programs_alt_99: Professional surf instructors guide students in a safe and professional environment

accessibility_p_12: Ruach BaGalim is committed to making our services accessible to the general public. We work to implement the Israeli Standard (IS 5568) guidelines based on WCAG 2.1 Level AA guidelines.
accessibility_p_13: We believe in equal rights and in every person's right to receive information and services independently and equally. This website was designed and built with special emphasis on accessibility for people with disabilities.
accessibility_p_14: The website complies with WCAG 2.1 Level AA standard, which includes:
accessibility_p_16: We work continuously to improve website accessibility and update it according to technological developments and user feedback.
accessibility_p_17: If you encountered an accessibility issue on the website or need assistance, please contact us:
accessibility_p_18: Response times: We respond to accessibility inquiries within 3 business days and work to resolve issues within 10 business days.
accessibility_p_19: Complaints: You can file a complaint with the Ministry of Justice - Commission for Equal Rights of Persons with Disabilities
